title: M Cafe de Chaya
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, American, Macrobiotic, Bakery, Catering, Fusion, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Except for a few fish items, menu is vegan prepared in the tradition of contemporary macrobiotic cooking principles. Offers assorted vegetable sandwiches, tempeh wrap and tofu wraps, rice bowls, vegan pastries, cupcakes, salads, soy latte and cappuccino, and more. No sugar or eggs used. Established since 2005.
